cocktails.name: Black Russian
cocktails.ingredients: 1.5 oz. Vodka, 1.5 oz. Caffe Lolita liqueur
cocktails.tastingNotes: Bittersweet, with rich hints of coffee and chocolate
cocktails.serveStyle: Stirred, served in a rocks glass over cracked ice

cocktails.name: Dirty Martini
cocktails.ingredients: 2 oz. Vodka, dash of dry vermouth, 1/2 oz. olive brine, olive garnish
cocktails.serveStyle: Shaken or stirred, served up in a martini glass

cocktails.name: Vesper
cocktails.ingredients: 3 oz. dry gin, 1 oz vodka, 1/2 oz. Lillet Blanc, lemon peel
cocktails.tastingNotes: Spirit-forward, herbaceous, slightly sweet finish with a hint of citrus
cocktails.serveStyle: Shaken and strained, served up in a martini glass

cocktails.name: Vodka Fizz
cocktails.ingredients: 2 oz. Vodka, 3/4 oz. lemon juice, 3/4 oz. simple syrup, one egg white, club soda
cocktails.serveStyle: Shaken, served in a highball glass

cocktails.name: Greyhound
cocktails.serveStyle: Shaken, served in collins or tall rocks glass

cocktails.name: Espresso Martini
cocktails.ingredients: 1.5 oz. Vodka, .75 oz. coffee liqueur, .5 oz. cr√®me de cacao
cocktails.tastingNotes: Silky, rich, creamy with a hint of vanilla
cocktails.serveStyle: Shaken and served up in a coupe or martini glass
